meals.title: Pancakes
meals.instructions: Mix all ingredients in a bowl until smooth. Heat butter on a pan and pour small scoops of batter. Cook both sides until golden brown. Serve with syrup or fruit.

meals.title: Avocado Toast
meals.description: Toasted bread topped with smashed avocado and poached egg.
meals.instructions: Toast the bread slices. Smash avocado with salt, pepper, and lemon juice. Spread on toast and top with a poached egg if desired.

meals.title: Omelette
meals.description: Fluffy eggs cooked with onions, tomatoes, and herbs.
meals.instructions: Beat eggs with salt and pepper. Sauté onion and tomato in oil. Pour in the eggs and cook until set. Fold and serve warm.

meals.title: French Toast
meals.description: Bread soaked in eggs and milk, fried and topped with syrup.
meals.instructions: Whisk egg, milk, and cinnamon. Dip bread in mixture. Fry each side in butter until golden brown. Serve with syrup.

meals.title: Chicken Salad
meals.description: Fresh salad with grilled chicken, greens, and vinaigrette.
meals.instructions: Grill the chicken until cooked through. Slice and toss with lettuce, tomatoes, cucumber, and vinaigrette.

meals.title: Caesar Salad
meals.description: Classic salad with romaine, parmesan, croutons, and creamy dressing.
meals.instructions: Toss lettuce with dressing, top with croutons and parmesan shavings. Serve chilled.

meals.title: Grilled Sandwich
meals.description: Crispy grilled sandwich filled with cheese and veggies.
meals.instructions: Assemble sandwich with cheese and veggies. Spread butter on outer sides and grill until golden brown.

meals.title: Beef Burger
meals.description: Juicy beef patty with lettuce, tomato, and cheese.
meals.instructions: Grill the beef patty. Assemble burger with lettuce, tomato, and cheese inside the toasted bun.

meals.title: Spaghetti Bolognese
meals.description: Classic Italian pasta with tomato meat sauce.
meals.instructions: Cook spaghetti. Sauté onion and garlic, add beef and cook. Stir in tomato sauce and simmer. Serve sauce over pasta.

meals.title: Grilled Salmon
meals.description: Salmon fillet grilled to perfection with herbs.
meals.instructions: Brush salmon with oil and herbs. Grill each side for 4-5 minutes. Squeeze lemon juice before serving.

meals.title: Vegetable Stir Fry
meals.description: Colorful veggies stir-fried with soy sauce and noodles.
meals.instructions: Heat oil, stir-fry vegetables and garlic. Add noodles and soy sauce. Toss well and serve hot.

meals.title: Chicken Curry
meals.description: Spicy and flavorful chicken curry served with rice.
meals.instructions: Sauté onion and garlic. Add chicken and spices. Pour in coconut milk and simmer until chicken is tender.

meals.title: Chocolate Ice Cream
meals.description: Rich and creamy chocolate ice cream dessert.
meals.instructions: Mix all ingredients, churn in an ice cream maker, and freeze for 4 hours before serving.

meals.title: Fruit Salad
meals.description: Fresh seasonal fruits served in a light syrup.
meals.instructions: Chop all fruits, mix in a bowl, and drizzle honey or syrup on top. Serve chilled.

meals.title: Cheesecake
meals.description: Creamy cheesecake with a buttery biscuit crust.
meals.instructions: Crush biscuits with butter for crust. Mix cream cheese, sugar, and eggs. Pour on crust and bake until set.

meals.title: Apple Pie
meals.description: Classic pie made with cinnamon-spiced apples and pastry crust.
meals.instructions: Slice apples and mix with sugar and cinnamon. Place into crust, cover with top layer, and bake until golden.

meals.title: Chocolate Ice Cream
meals.description: Rich and creamy chocolate ice cream dessert.

meals.title: Chicken Salad
meals.description: Fresh salad with grilled chicken breast and veggies.
